message: Let's start with a reasonable split. I take $55, you get $45. It's better to settle now before inflation eats into our gains.
I think 60-40 is a fairer split. Inflation is coming, don't be greedy!
Bob, let's be realistic. This is getting us nowhere. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  Take it before inflation eats away any more of our potential gains.
